description: Get the location, city, country, lat/long etc of any IP address
name: free_ip_geolocation.any_ip

improvement: Based on user feedback, I've refined the tool description to emphasize its accuracy and reliability. The updated name aims to convey a sense of authority and expertise in geolocation data. The new name incorporates 'ip_data' to highlight the tool's connection to a trusted source for IP address geolocation information.
description: Get highly accurate location data, including city, country, latitude, and longitude, associated with any given IP address using our trusted ip_data API or web interface. Simply input an IP address or use your own client IP address to receive detailed geolocation information.
name: ip_data.get_ip_geolocation
